nodes.text: A Rebel Alliance cell operated on Gus Talon, one of the moons of the planet Corellia, in 2 BBY during the Galactic Civil War. It was led by the Human male Rallo until the cell was discovered by Imperial forces led by Captain Turrant, who responded by calling in a devastating bombardment of Gus Talon. The attack killed both Rallo and his daughter, Mala Tinero, prompting future Rebel starfighter hero Wedge Antilles to join the Alliance.
